# RAVEL
## Use of RAVEL intensity normalization methods for Loes study structural MRIs.

### Before

1. Run `normalize_intensity_with_ravel_test.R <input_dir> <output_dir>`

   For example: `Rscript normalize_intensity_with_ravel_test.R "/users/9/reine097/data/fairview-ag/anonymized/processed/" "/users/9/reine097/raveled/"`
2. Run `create_ravel_control_region.R`

   TODO Currently the file paths are hard-coded.  This needs to be generalized.
